title: Jana Small Finance Bank to offer 6.75% short-term deposit rates with no early withdrawal penalties
description: Jana Small Finance Bank has introduced a flat 6.75% rate for short-term deposits over Rs 10 lakh and removed penalties for early withdrawal. This offer, effective from September 19, aims to attract short-term funds. Small savers will get rates between 3.5% and 6.5%, while seniors receive an additional 50 basis points.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
